20:06:24 SQL> ALTER SESSION SET NLS_DATE_FORMAT = 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss';

Session altered.

Elapsed: 00:00:00.00
20:06:24 SQL> 
20:06:24 SQL> 20:06:24 SQL> --
20:06:24 SQL> -- merge.sql
20:06:24 SQL> --
20:06:24 SQL> 
20:06:24 SQL> -- I use this script to merge data from ibs_stage into ibs5min.
20:06:24 SQL> 
20:06:24 SQL> 
20:06:24 SQL> -- CREATE TABLE ibs_old	  (tkr VARCHAR2(8),ydate DATE,clse NUMBER);
20:06:24 SQL> -- CREATE TABLE ibs_dups_old(tkr VARCHAR2(8),ydate DATE,clse NUMBER);
20:06:24 SQL> 
20:06:24 SQL> DROP TABLE ibs_old;

Table dropped.

Elapsed: 00:00:00.23
20:06:25 SQL> RENAME ibs5min TO ibs_old;

Table renamed.

Elapsed: 00:00:00.11
20:06:25 SQL> 
20:06:25 SQL> DROP TABLE ibs_dups_old;

Table dropped.

Elapsed: 00:00:00.24
20:06:25 SQL> RENAME ibs_dups TO ibs_dups_old;

Table renamed.

Elapsed: 00:00:00.17
20:06:25 SQL> 
20:06:25 SQL> CREATE TABLE ibs_dups COMPRESS AS
20:06:25   2  SELECT
20:06:25   3  tkr
20:06:25   4  ,(TO_DATE('1970-01-01','YYYY-MM-DD')+(epochsec/24/3600))ydate
20:06:25   5  ,clse
20:06:25   6  FROM ibs_stage
20:06:25   7  UNION
20:06:25   8  SELECT tkr,ydate,clse
20:06:25   9  FROM ibs_old
20:06:25  10  /

Table created.

Elapsed: 00:00:03.39
20:06:28 SQL> 
20:06:28 SQL> -- ibs_stage may have data outside of RTH.
20:06:28 SQL> -- Remove data which is outside of RTH:
20:06:28 SQL> DELETE ibs_dups WHERE TO_CHAR(ydate,'HH24:MI') < '14:30'AND ydate < '2011-03-14';

0 rows deleted.

Elapsed: 00:00:00.31
20:06:29 SQL> DELETE ibs_dups WHERE TO_CHAR(ydate,'HH24:MI') > '20:55'AND ydate < '2011-03-14';

0 rows deleted.

Elapsed: 00:00:00.28
20:06:29 SQL> -- Daylight savings time started on 2011-03-14:
20:06:29 SQL> DELETE ibs_dups WHERE TO_CHAR(ydate,'HH24:MI') < '13:30'AND ydate > '2011-03-14';

0 rows deleted.

Elapsed: 00:00:00.20
20:06:29 SQL> DELETE ibs_dups WHERE TO_CHAR(ydate,'HH24:MI') > '19:55'AND ydate > '2011-03-14';

0 rows deleted.

Elapsed: 00:00:00.21
20:06:29 SQL> 
20:06:29 SQL> CREATE TABLE ibs5min COMPRESS AS
20:06:29   2  SELECT
20:06:29   3  tkr
20:06:29   4  ,ydate
20:06:29   5  ,AVG(clse)clse
20:06:29   6  FROM ibs_dups
20:06:29   7  GROUP BY tkr,ydate
20:06:29   8  /

Table created.

Elapsed: 00:00:03.06
20:06:33 SQL> 
20:06:33 SQL> ANALYZE TABLE ibs5min COMPUTE STATISTICS;

Table analyzed.

Elapsed: 00:00:04.97
20:06:37 SQL> 
20:06:37 SQL> -- I should see less than 60 min:
20:06:37 SQL> SELECT
20:06:37   2  tkr
20:06:37   3  ,(sysdate - MAX(ydate))*24*60 minutes_age
20:06:37   4  ,MIN(ydate)
20:06:37   5  ,COUNT(ydate)
20:06:37   6  ,MAX(ydate)FROM
20:06:37   7  ibs5min
20:06:37   8  GROUP BY tkr
20:06:37   9  ORDER BY tkr
20:06:37  10  /
